description:
My place is close to The Cloisters, Starbucks, Duane Reade, Express A & 1 train, Restaurants, Bars, Clubs. You’ll love my place because of the people, the ambiance, and the proximity to Manhattan. Queen size bed and one twin blow up mattress available as well as a couch. Full kitchen. 

I go out often & can give you great tips. I also find lost of cool & free things to do in the city so def use me as a sounding board. I have a twin blow up mattress available if you need it! Nespresso available!

Features a tv in the bedroom and living room with Apple TV, Amazon Firestick, and a Playstation.

Access to entire apartment. Full kitchen. No closets. If informed prior to your arrival, hangers can be left out and clothing can be hung from the bed's four post frame, I do it all the time :)

The apartment is on the 1st floor.

Generally, I will be available to help and only 15 mins away if you need me!

The 1 trains is 4 blocks away
Express A train 4 blocks away as well.

I live in the apartment full-time so please respect my personal things such as clothes in drawers, shoes, personal products like make-up in the bathroom, groceries in the kitchen...etc. 

Good rule of thumb: If you did not purchase it and it wasn't designated for your use please ask before you take :)

Essentials will be provided!

My baby toy Maltese dog has returned to live in my home. She does not shed and everything will be cleaned prior to your arrival. Just as a heads up for any drastic allergies. She will not be in the apartment during your stay.
name: Stylish 1 bedroom apartment in Manhattan
review: Ivanna was very helpful and quick to respond to any questions I had. The house was immaculate and spotless. I really enjoyed the coffee machine and the comfy couch and t.v.! Overall It was a great place to stay, easy to find, and close to public transportation.
